entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 10:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -32.9°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -39.2°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
